FoneChoice is a division of HomeChoice (Pty) Ltd and complies with the National Credit Act No. 34 of 2005, NCR Registration No. NCRCP454. Costs incorporated in credit instalments include delivery fee (R353, incl. VAT), interest (27.75%) and initiation fee (equalling 16.5% of the first R1000 loaned and 10% of the remainder thereafter, up to a maximum of R1050). A monthly credit contract service fee of R35.40 also applies if you place an order on credit. The cash price is subject to a delivery fee of R353, incl. VAT. Offer valid while stocks last. This offer expires on 30 November 2019. Errors and Omissions Excepted (E & OE). *Insurance is compulsory when you take any of our offers on credit.
